General.Name: Fathom Nickel Inc
General.Description: Fathom Nickel Inc., a resource exploration and development company, engages in identifying, acquiring, and exploring the base and precious metals for use in electric vehicle and battery markets. The company primarily explores for nickel deposits. Its flagship project is the Albert Lake Project, which consists of 31 mineral claims covering an area of 90,460 hectares located in the La Ronge Mining District of Saskatchewan, Canada. The company is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 521-3rd Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3T3
